website_summaries.verdict: A fast, easy build along with unique mini figures and a cool “exploding” prison makes this perfect for young and old fans alike. Its sub-$20 price point doesn’t hurt, either.
pros: The mini figures are a top draw for this LEGO set, with Lobo, Superman, and adult Krypto included
Kryptonite prison has unique “explode” feature to break out Superman
cons: Small, limited build with just 1 clear play setup, although the set is compatible with other DC Heroes sets

customer_reviews.title: Great set, son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and a half year old really wanted a Superman LEGO set. They’re aren’t a ton of them, so I did some looking and found this one. He loves it, especially that it comes with Superman’s dog. He was able to put it together mostly on his own in about an hour and a half. Everything was perfect, just what I expect from LEGO.
customer_reviews.author: JessLV

customer_reviews.title: Another great dc set
customer_reviews.text: Great build for an awesome minifigure and character. Krypto is an amazing new addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lets go Legos!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a Christmas gift for my grandkids. They are going to love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Perry

customer_reviews.title: its lego lobo
customer_reviews.text: if you are a lobo fan and like legos, this is a good set to get.easy to put together and a good way to have lego lobo and his ride in your collection.

customer_reviews.title: The Lobo and krypto Minifigures are more than amazing, Superman meh
customer_reviews.text: The Lobo and krypto Minifigures are more than amazing , Superman meh! But Lobo and his bike . I am pretty sure this set will be really expensive after the movie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LEGO set.

customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for one of my grandsons and it came fast and exceeds what I thought the set would include. I will definitely order from you folks more, moving forward.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Sweet! Lobo is really awesome. Meets all expectations if your a DC fan.
customer_reviews.author: jake lowry

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and overoaid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandson. For the price paid I got totally ripped off. Or maybe Legos only caters to the rich now. Make sure you shop around on sites beside Amazon. Its a tiny box and small when put together. Quality has gone downhill. And prices have gone way up. Found that ebay had it 30 bucks cheaper. But the product is probably worth about 5 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Uninspired, But Fun Set
customer_reviews.text: Lego sets are always good, but this one doesn't quite work. The figures seem a bit uninspiring, with Lobo and Superman paired with a Space Hog and Kryptonite prison. There is an obvious story here, and I guess that is the problem. It is too specifically set up for one situation. The Krypto dog figure could also be a bit cuter. Otherwise, the set is fun and a good build for hardcore Superman fans. There are better sets for kids that just want something to play with, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Alert

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity to do with your child!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old daughter and I did this together. She did have a hard time with it, but I'm sure most of it is due to the fact, she's only done legos twice. I got this so we could do an activity together and she does like superheros. She enjoyed it and it was fun to spend time doing this with her rather than watching TV, or spending a lot of money on an outside activity.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Funtastic!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this set! He ripped it open lickity split, got out instructions, and went to town. Pieces are well made, instructions well written, and had some unique ideas when they made this.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fun and creative as alwys.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves Legos ! He has this assembled in no time and has integrated it with his other sets Legos are great for bringing out ones creativity and imagination. Legos are ,always a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Angelfish

customer_reviews.title: cool old school superman stuff
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice throwback superman villan / bad guy set. This will be a fun little set for those kiddos or even adults that remember the comics with Krypto.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: LEGOs are the best. My kids love these and this set is no different. Easy to follow instructions. Superman set is great.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes Superman & Krypto Team-Up 76096 Building Kit (199 Piece)
product_meta.description: Join Krypto the Superdog’s bid to release Superman with this LEGO DC Super Heroes 76096 Superman & Krypto Team-Up set. This Justice League toy features Lobo’s Space Hog bike, a Kryptonite prison, buildable red Energy Infuser and assorted translucent-green Power Burst elements to customize your builds and minifigures. Fire the Space Hog bike’s stud shooters and use its bomb-dropping function to activate the prison’s explode function. This cool superhero toy for kids includes 2 Justice League minifigures and a Krypto the Superdog figure.
feature_bullets: Build Lobo’s Space Hog bike featuring Kryptonite stud shooters and bomb-release function and a Kryptonite prison with an explode function
Includes 3 Justice League figures—a Superman figure, Lobo figure plus a buildable Krypto figure—plus 10 Power Burst elements
Space Hog measures over 3” (9cm) high, 7” (20cm) long and 4” (11cm) wide Kryptonite prison measures over 2” (7cm) high, 4” (11cm) wide and 1” (5cm) deep
199 pieces – Superhero toy for boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
